mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(productKind, productName, productOrigin, productPrice, productVolume, productCount, productImg, productImgOriName, productImgUrl) VALUES(#{productKind}, #{productName}, #{productOrigin}, #{productPrice}, #{productVolume}, #{productCount}, #{productImg}, #{productImgOriName}, #{productImgUrl});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product where productCom ORDER BY productCom DESC limit 6;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(productNum, productName, productPrice, buyer, buyCount, buyAmount, productImg) VALUES(#{productNum}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{buyer}, #{buyCount}, #{buyAmount}, #{productImg});
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cart WHERE productNum=#{productNum} AND buyer=#{buyer};
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET buyCount = buyCount + #{buyCount} ,buyAmount = buyAmount + #{buyAmount} WHERE productNum=#{productNum} AND buyer=#{buyer};
